Recently new intraoral mask `` NuMask '' become available anesthetic induction . It place lip outside gums patient mouth ( similar snorkel mouth piece ) , thus provide good seal almost patient . In addition provide good seal , NuMask advantage standard face mask . It small dead space ( 18 cc : 110 cc ) , provide comfortable grip , ventilation provide position cause less facial trauma .
